Question:
In each of the following questions, five words have been given out of which four are alike in some manner, while the fifth one is different. Choose the word which is different from the rest.

Choose the word which is different from the rest.

A. Japan
B. India
C. Sri Lanka
D. New Zealand
Solution: All except India are islands, while India is a peninsula.

Question:

Question:
In each of the following questions, five words have been given out of which four are alike in some manner, while the fifth one is different. Choose the word which is different from the rest.

Choose the word which is different from the rest.

B. Bagpipe

Solution: All except Sitar are wind instruments, while sitar is a string instrument.

Question:

Solution: All except Bear belong to the cat family.

Question:
